description:
Job Description

Please see attachment for full position description

How To Apply

Application/Resume review BEFORE selection for interviews.

Please send a completed City Application and Resume to hwillis@lawa.org with the subject line, "Senior Administrative Clerk Transfer Opportunity - Badging Unit"

Deadline to submit applications and resumes is 8/27/2024 by 4:00PM.

Transfer

These positions are only available for City employees. Please do not respond if you do not currently work for the City of Los Angeles.

Closing Date/Time: 8/27/24
